Configuring vHBA

To configure vHBA, perform the following:

 1. In the vHBA Configuration screen, enter the name of the vHBA and click Add to configure vHBA.

 2. From vHBA Template drop-down list, select an appropriate vHBA Template.

 3. From the FC Adapter Policy drop-down list, select the required FC adapter policy.

 4. Click Add to configure the vHBA.

Figure 6-7 vHBA Configuration

 5. Click Save and next to proceed further
